name: Iren
appearance: Tall and spare, grey-templed, with a basalt-black civic coat and a signet of the Conclave. His eyes hold the steady gleam of the tide-window’s light.
character: Equanimous arbiter whose patience masks a steel-edged will; he believes procedure can civilize any storm if enough people agree to enter the room.
dreams: Unify the four banks under a fairer charter
Stabilize flood authority without emergency decrees
Re-raise the Charterstone without enthroning a king
secrets: Accepted a Night Ledger white-book pardon to spare a nephew, compromising him
Knows of the tide-window’s older oath and keeps it off the record
Green-lit a ‘soft flood’ coin release once and regrets the famine it worsened upriver
